name: telegram_bus_arrival_bot
description: A telegram based bot that retrieves API calls from LTA to display queried bus timings based on bus stop number. Update timezone accordingly. LTA API dataset uses standard Singapore timezone   ![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/72028616/157471563-d590af68-5bd4-4490-89e7-f5d67c0ffae6.png)
